text: Q17.| MSQ] Consider relation R(A,B,C,D,E) with the set of functional dependencies {A— B, AB—CD, D—ABCE}. Which of the following is/are possible key(s)-of relation R? (@ A (D (c) AB (d)CD Answer :- (a)&(b) Solution: 2V {A*={ABCDE} {AB}* Super key {D}={ABCDE} D is a key so CD is super key. Answer:(a)&(b)
